definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Those opinions and propositions were agreed upon and echoed by many participating leaders.
sentences.chinese: 這些觀點和主張得到許多與會領導人的贊同和呼應。

sentences.english: House and Senate conferees have struck a deal on the new farm bill.
sentences.chinese: 參衆兩院與會代表已就新的農業法案達成協議。

sentences.english: The ending was a kicker and it was generally a pretty good movie.
sentences.chinese: 結束是一個踢球者和與會者普遍一個不錯的電影。

sentences.english: African delegates said they hope to learn from Vietnam's agricultural example.
sentences.chinese: 非洲與會代表說，他們希望向越南的農業範例學習。

sentences.english: Attendees registering for the meeting crowded the lobby of the Moscone Center.
sentences.chinese: 茅斯考恩中心的大廳擠滿了正準備登記的與會者。

sentences.english: The King'n Trio entertained attendees with their folk songs and Rotary-themed lyrics.
sentences.chinese: 三重唱用他們的民歌和扶輪主題的歌曲來款待與會者。

sentences.english: About a thousand people attended the meeting.
Participants agreed to boost security and development in the central Asian nation.
sentences.chinese: 與會者同意加強阿富汗的安全及發展的工作。

sentences.english: Opening Ceremony was successfully held after the round trip of lion performance at the exhibition hall .
sentences.chinese: 開幕典禮在醒獅帶領與會者到展覽館繞場一週後完成。

sentences.english: Second, I will not tolerate abuse of our relationship with Member States.
sentences.chinese: 其次，我不能容忍濫用我們與會員國的關係。

sentences.english: The attendees mingled, exchanged calling cards and traded cameras for photographs.
sentences.chinese: 與會者交雜著，互相交換名片與相互拍照留念。

sentences.english: Municipal officials and representatives of the government-authorized labor union have also attended meetings of the workers’ council with management, workers said.
sentences.chinese: 中山官員與工會代表也一道與會。

sentences.english: Then she could take her seat on the Supreme Court when it meets in October.
sentences.chinese: 這樣在最高法院十月與會時，埃琳娜可以順利就任。

sentences.english: In the stock market, the participants are all motivated to buy low and sell high.
sentences.chinese: 在股票市場上，與會者都積極地低買高賣。

sentences.english: After this connection is established, it synchronizes with the rest of the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 連接建立之後，它與會議的其他部分進行同步。

sentences.english: Agile 2007 attendees can choose from more than 615 highly interactive sessions.
sentences.chinese: 有超過615個高度互動的課程讓與會者們選擇。
